content.text: table is designed to store information related to utility reading codes, which are likely used to categorize or describe different types of readings taken from utility meters. This table includes metadata about each reading code, such as descriptions and whether the reading is estimated. It also tracks the user who authenticated the entry and timestamps for when the record was added or last updated.
